## ShaderHelper.getNormalMatrix() method

Gets the uniform variable of type mat4 which holds the normal matrix of current object to be drawn

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getNormalMatrix(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope): PBShaderExp;
```
